function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate housing unit design for health and safety","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and decreased well-being for residents","Mitigation":"Implementing architectural modifications to improve ventilation, space allocation, and sanitation facilities","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, UV disinfection technology, and touchless fixtures","People":"Residents of the housing units","Owner":"Architecture and engineering firms"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for pandemic-specific housing design","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to infectious diseases and reduced resilience to future pandemics","Mitigation":"Conducting a thorough review of housing design guidelines to include pandemic-specific features","Technologies":"Incorporating flexible space layouts, antimicrobial materials, and health monitoring systems","People":"Planners, architects, and housing developers","Owner":"Urban planning authorities and housing development organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate allocation of space in housing units","Impact":"Higher risk of close contact and limited ability to practice social distancing","Mitigation":"Reconfiguring interior layouts to optimize space for individual and communal activities","Technologies":"Modular furniture, movable partitions, and space-saving storage solutions","People":"Residents and visitors of the housing units","Owner":"Interior designers and architects"}]}
